subsections.title: 1.1 Personal Data
subsections.content: Planix does not directly collect personal data such as your name, address, or phone number. The only identifying data comes from your Google account when you sign in to enable Google Drive backup (email address, user ID, Drive permissions). This information is not shared, sold, or stored on third-party servers.

subsections.title: 1.2 Local Data
subsections.content: The app stores locally your events, display preferences, backup history, statistics, and scheduled notifications. This data never leaves your device.

subsections.title: 1.3 Backup Data
subsections.content: If you choose Google Drive backup, Planix creates a private folder in your Drive and stores encrypted backups there. The app has access only to these files, which you can delete at any time.

subsections.title: 1.4 Notification Data
subsections.content: To enable push notifications, Planix stores locally your FCM (Firebase Cloud Messaging) token and some event information (title, message, date, event ID). This data is only used to notify you and is not shared with anyone else. Scheduled notifications may be synchronized with our cloud backend to ensure delivery even when offline. No data is used for advertising purposes.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
sections.content: Data is used only to record, restore, and synchronize your events, manage preferences, perform Drive backups, and schedule/display notifications. No data is shared for advertising or analytics purposes.

sections.title: 3. Data Storage and Security
sections.content: Local data is securely stored on your device. Google Drive backups and cloud notifications are protected via OAuth 2.0 and Firebase security rules. Planix does not send any data to unsecured third-party servers.

sections.title: 4. Google Authentication
sections.content: Planix uses Google Sign-In to verify your identity and obtain Drive permissions. No sensitive data (passwords, access tokens) is stored.

sections.title: 5. Themes and Personalization
sections.content: Your theme (light/dark) and language preferences are stored locally on your device.

sections.title: 6. Languages
sections.content: Planix is available in French and English. No language-related data is sent to external servers.

sections.title: 7. Local Statistics
sections.content: Charts and histories are generated locally from your data. No usage data is collected.

sections.title: 8. Your Rights
sections.content: You can delete local data, delete Planix files in Google Drive, and revoke Planix permissions in your Google account at any time. You can also disable notifications or delete scheduled notifications stored in the cloud.

sections.title: 9. Contact
sections.content: For any questions or requests regarding privacy, contact us at donaldnkouathio@gmail.com.

sections.title: 10. Changes to this Policy
sections.content: Any changes will be posted on this page with a new update date. We encourage you to review it regularly.

sections.title: 11. Consent
sections.content: By using Planix, you agree to this privacy policy.

events.storage: On your device and synchronized via our cloud backend for notifications

notifications.storage: Locally on the device and on the cloud backend for delivery
